item.title: Brocade Certified Network Professional
item.description: Passed Brocade 150-220 exam, another badge added to my c.v. Having a CCNP background and some CCIE theory knowledge I found this exam quite easy.On the exam blueprint just some QoS implementations, VRRP-E and Metro Ring ProtocolÂ are different than Cisco exams. STP and IGP/BGP are almost the same, and no EIGRP of course!
